Kassiopeia  3
Monte Carlo simulation program specializing in tracking particles in electric and magnetic fields

26  const KSComponent::StateType& KSComponent::State() const
27  {

31  void KSComponent::Initialize()
32  {
33  if( fState == eIdle )
34  {
35  objctmsg_debug( "component <" << this->GetName() << "> initializing" << eom );
36  InitializeComponent();
37  fState = eInitialized;
38 
39  for( vector< KSComponent* >::iterator tIt = fChildComponents.begin(); tIt != fChildComponents.end(); tIt++ )
40  {
41  (*tIt)->Initialize();
42  }
43 
44  return;
45  }
46 
47  if( fState != eInitialized )
48  {
49  objctmsg( eError ) << "tried to initialize component <" << this->GetName() << "> from state <" << this->fState << ">" << eom;
50  }
51 
52  return;
53  }
54  void KSComponent::Deinitialize()
55  {
56  if( fState == eInitialized )
57  {
58  objctmsg_debug( "component <" << this->GetName() << "> deinitializing" << eom );
59  DeinitializeComponent();
60  fState = eIdle;
61 
62  for( vector< KSComponent* >::iterator tIt = fChildComponents.begin(); tIt != fChildComponents.end(); tIt++ )
63  {
64  (*tIt)->Deinitialize();
65  }
66 
67  return;
68  }
69 
70  if( fState != eIdle )
71  {
72  objctmsg( eError ) << "tried to deinitialize component <" << this->GetName() << "> from state <" << this->fState << ">" << eom;
73  }
74 
75  return;
76  }
77  void KSComponent::Activate()
78  {
79  if( fState == eInitialized )
80  {
81  objctmsg_debug( "component <" << this->GetName() << "> activating" << eom );
82  ActivateComponent();
83  fState = eActivated;
84 
85  for( vector< KSComponent* >::iterator tIt = fChildComponents.begin(); tIt != fChildComponents.end(); tIt++ )
86  {
87  (*tIt)->Activate();
88  }
89 
90  return;
91  }
92 
93  if( fState != eActivated )
94  {
95  objctmsg( eError ) << "tried to activate component <" << this->GetName() << "> from state <" << this->fState << ">" << eom;
96  }
97 
98  return;
99  }
100  void KSComponent::Deactivate()
101  {
102  if( fState == eActivated )
103  {
104  objctmsg_debug( "component <" << this->GetName() << "> deactivating" << eom );
105  DeactivateComponent();
106  fState = eInitialized;
107 
108  for( vector< KSComponent* >::iterator tIt = fChildComponents.begin(); tIt != fChildComponents.end(); tIt++ )
109  {
110  (*tIt)->Deactivate();
111  }
112 
113  return;
114  }
115 
116  if( fState != eInitialized )
117  {
118  objctmsg( eError ) << "tried to deactivate component <" << this->GetName() << "> from state <" << this->fState << ">" << eom;
119  }
120 
121  return;
122  }
123  void KSComponent::PushUpdate()
124  {
125  if( fState == eActivated )
126  {
127  objctmsg_debug( "component <" << this->GetName() << "> pushing update" << eom );
128  PushUpdateComponent();
129  fState = eUpdated;
130 
131  for( vector< KSComponent* >::iterator tIt = fChildComponents.begin(); tIt != fChildComponents.end(); tIt++ )
132  {
133  (*tIt)->PushUpdate();
134  }
135 
136  return;
137  }
138 
139  if( fState != eUpdated )
140  {
141  objctmsg( eError ) << "tried to push update component <" << this->GetName() << "> from state <" << this->fState << ">" << eom;
142  }
143 
144  for( vector< KSComponent* >::iterator tIt = fChildComponents.begin(); tIt != fChildComponents.end(); tIt++ )
145  {
146  (*tIt)->PushUpdate();
147  }
148 
149  return;
150  }
151  void KSComponent::PushDeupdate()
152  {
153  if( fState == eUpdated )
154  {
155  objctmsg_debug( "component <" << this->GetName() << "> pushing deupdate" << eom );
156  PushDeupdateComponent();
157  fState = eActivated;
158 
159  for( vector< KSComponent* >::iterator tIt = fChildComponents.begin(); tIt != fChildComponents.end(); tIt++ )
160  {
161  (*tIt)->PushDeupdate();
162  }
163 
164  return;
165  }
166 
167  if( fState != eActivated )
168  {
169  objctmsg( eError ) << "tried to push deupdate component <" << this->GetName() << "> from state <" << this->fState << ">" << eom;
170  }
171 
172  for( vector< KSComponent* >::iterator tIt = fChildComponents.begin(); tIt != fChildComponents.end(); tIt++ )
173  {
174  (*tIt)->PushDeupdate();
175  }
176 
177  return;
178  }
179  void KSComponent::PullUpdate()
180  {
181  if( fState == eActivated )
182  {
183  if( fParentComponent != NULL )
184  {
185  fParentComponent->PullUpdate();
186  }
187 
188  objctmsg_debug( "component <" << this->GetName() << "> pulling update" << eom );
189  PullUpdateComponent();
190  fState = eUpdated;
191 
192  return;
193  }
194 
195  if( fState != eUpdated )
196  {
197  objctmsg( eError ) << "tried to pull update component <" << this->GetName() << "> from state <" << this->fState << ">" << eom;
198  return;
199  }
200 
201  if( fParentComponent != NULL )
202  {
203  fParentComponent->PullUpdate();
204  }
205 
206  return;
207  }
208  void KSComponent::PullDeupdate()
209  {
210  if( fState == eUpdated )
211  {
212  if( fParentComponent != NULL )
213  {
214  fParentComponent->PullDeupdate();
215  }
216 
217  objctmsg_debug( "component <" << this->GetName() << "> pulling deupdate" << eom );
218  PullDeupdateComponent();
219  fState = eActivated;
220 
221  return;
222  }
223 
224  if( fState != eActivated )
225  {
226  objctmsg( eError ) << "tried to pull deupdate component <" << this->GetName() << "> from state <" << this->fState << ">" << eom;
227  return;
228  }
229 
230  if( fParentComponent != NULL )
231  {
232  fParentComponent->PullDeupdate();
233  }
234 
235  return;
236  }

281  void KSComponent::AddChild( KSComponent* aChild )
282  {
283  fChildComponents.push_back( aChild );
284  return;
285  }
286  unsigned int KSComponent::GetChildCount() const
287  {
288  return fChildComponents.size();
289  }
290  KSComponent* KSComponent::GetChild( const unsigned int& anIndex ) const
291  {
292  return fChildComponents.at( anIndex );
293  }
